channel.title: Matt Clifton / @slightly99
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @slightly99. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title: My eating disorder and sleep disorder combine at 2am and so here I am in the kitchen making a double bowl of oatmeal
item.dc:creator: @slightly99
item.description: My eating disorder and sleep disorder combine at 2am and so here I am in the kitchen making a double bowl of oatmeal

item.title: R to @thomasareed: Congratulations! 🏃
item.dc:creator: @slightly99
item.description: Congratulations! 🏃

item.title: I’m at the age where any conversation I start is either about gardening or healthcare. I’m so sorry.
item.dc:creator: @slightly99
item.description: I’m at the age where any conversation I start is either about gardening or healthcare. I’m so sorry.

item.title: 2.30am is a real crunch point for existential depression
item.dc:creator: @slightly99
item.description: 2.30am is a real crunch point for existential depression

item.title: R to @dubzkis: The Star Destroyer is pretty badass, but I do love the maneuverability of the Assassin-class Corvette.
item.dc:creator: @slightly99
item.description: The Star Destroyer is pretty badass, but I do love the maneuverability of the Assassin-class Corvette.

item.title: R to @gralefrit: My biggest disappointment there is that Maureen Lipman writes for the Mail.
item.dc:creator: @slightly99
item.description: My biggest disappointment there is that Maureen Lipman writes for the Mail.

item.title: R to @RandPaul: Oh your prayers go out? What do your prayers say? What do they fucking say? Exactly what words are in those prayers that you’re sending out?
item.dc:creator: @slightly99
item.description: Oh your prayers go out? What do your prayers say? What do they fucking say? Exactly what words are in those prayers that you’re sending out?

item.title: RT by @slightly99: Maria Callas - Medea. London, 1959.

item.title: R to @davidwhittam: Is Bill Baggs responsible for this?
item.dc:creator: @slightly99
item.description: Is Bill Baggs responsible for this?

item.title: I wish the English language wasn’t using “dropped” as “introduced” as WELL as for “let go” because it is quite confusing
item.dc:creator: @slightly99
item.description: I wish the English language wasn’t using “dropped” as “introduced” as WELL as for “let go” because it is quite confusing

item.title: Do I HAVE to get out of this bath and go to bed?
item.dc:creator: @slightly99
item.description: Do I HAVE to get out of this bath and go to bed?

item.title: R to @cjhancock: “Hit me with your Rhythm Stick” (Ian Dury) - lots of foreign places; “You’ll Always Find me in the Kitchen at Parties” (Jona Lewie) - loads of UK places (most of them at the end of song and lyric listings omit them) - inc my hometown “toasters of Tonbridge”
item.dc:creator: @slightly99
item.description: “Hit me with your Rhythm Stick” (Ian Dury) - lots of foreign places; “You’ll Always Find me in the Kitchen at Parties” (Jona Lewie) - loads of UK places (most of them at the end of song and lyric listings omit them) - inc my hometown “toasters of Tonbridge”

item.title: My fridge has started to make excited “woo!” noises in the middle of the night. It’s either prepping for robot takeover of the world, or it’s dying, because the food we have in there right now is not that exciting.
item.dc:creator: @slightly99
item.description: My fridge has started to make excited “woo!” noises in the middle of the night. It’s either prepping for robot takeover of the world, or it’s dying, because the food we have in there right now is not that exciting.

item.title: R to @Read_Instead: 6’4”. Used to be 6’5” but I got a herniated disk.
item.dc:creator: @slightly99
item.description: 6’4”. Used to be 6’5” but I got a herniated disk.

item.title: R to @CraigCaplan: Watch @Sen_JoeManchin vote this down like a fucking asshole

item.title: Submitted a batch of poems to a couple of journals today. I feel quite proud of myself!
item.dc:creator: @slightly99

item.title: R to @britishlibrary: Always, to this day, smash the bottom of an upturned egg shell after eating a boiled egg. So witches can’t use them as boats. I’m 50.
item.dc:creator: @slightly99
item.description: Always, to this day, smash the bottom of an upturned egg shell after eating a boiled egg. So witches can’t use them as boats. I’m 50.
